description:
Kobari Yuji, commonly called Master is the calm and polite proprietor of "Harry`s", a cafe frequented by Robin and the rest of the series` main cast. His son, Yukata, is a witch and it is hinted that Master has "awakened" as well. He usually provides the Hunters with information that he manages to pick up from his customers. He takes a special interest in Robin, looking out for her and preparing food for her when she cannot come to the bar. Near the series` conclusion, he empathizes with her troubles and welcomes her "home."
Source: Wiki
name: Master
